nodes.text: Marcha was a female Drall. She had a prized garden of nannariums. On her homeworld she was duchess of Mastigophorous, and she was the aunt of Ebrihim.

Marcha lived in a magnificent and sprawling estate on Drall on the edge of a river. She helped Han Solo escape from his cousin, Thrackan, during the Corellian Crisis. As a result, when Governor-General Micamberlecto was killed in the fighting, Chief of State Leia Organa Solo appointed Marcha to be the new Governor-General of the Corellian sector.

During the early years of the Yuuzhan Vong War, she reluctantly allowed the New Republic Defense Fleet to use Centerpoint Station as a weapon against the Yuuzhan Vong. Her allowance led to the disastrous Battle of Fondor; following the battle, she was kicked out of office, the Centerpoint Party came to power, and Thrackan Sal-Solo reclaimed his position of power.
